ICCM Lock

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x414
Size:
0x4

Description

Control register to gate writes to the ICCM. When set to 1, writes are blocked. When cleared to 0, writes allowed. Write-once, meaning only a reset can clear it once set to 1. Writes available to Caliptra subsystem, not SoC.

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:1] - - - -
[0] lock rw1 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

lock

Lock bit gates writes to ICCM.
